body.name: LOL Surprise Mix & Make Birthday Cake Tots with Collectible Doll, DIY Cake Dress, Cake Making and Decorating, Ingredients and Glitter Sprinkles, Cake Dress Doll- Great Gift for Girls Age 3+

features: MAKE YOUR OWN BIRTHDAY CAKE DRESS: L.O.L. Surprise! Mix & Make Birthday Cake! With three mixes, decorative glitter, and a dress mold – you can design your very own birthday cake dress!
DIY FUN: Simply pour the ingredients, add water, let set, and decorate to make a colorful, sparkly cake dress for your doll!
FAN-FAVORITE CHARACTERS: Find favorite characters like Neon Q.T., Bon Bon, Ice Sk8r, and Super B.B.!
INCLUDES: L.O.L. Surprise! Mix & Make Birthday Cake Tot includes 3 colorful ingredients, cake mold, fashion, accessories, spatula, and glitter sprinkles for decorating
COLLECT THEM ALL: Collect all 9 L.O.L. Surprise! Mix & Make Birthday Cake! and design so many different dress cakes!
body.description: Introducing L.O.L. Surprise! Mix & Make Birthday Cake™ dolls! These Tots are ready to walk the runway in their cake dress creations that you design! Each L.O.L. Surprise! Mix & Make Birthday Cake™ doll comes with three mixes, and decorative glitter to design the cake dress of your dreams! Simply pour the ingredients, add water, let set, and decorate to make a colorful, sparkly cake dress for your doll! Find favorite characters like Neon Q.T., Bon Bon, Ice Sk8r, and Super B.B. Your child will have so much fun choosing how they design and decorate their cake, then once the mold has set the birthday cake becomes a beautiful dress you can style and display! Every doll comes with unique fashions and detailed accessories to reveal. L.O.L. Surprise! Mix & Make Birthday Cake™ Tot includes 3 colorful ingredients, cake mold, fashion, accessories, spatula, and glitter sprinkles for decorating. Collect all 9 LOL Surprise Mix & Make Birthday Cake™ dolls and create so many different dresses and styles. LOL Surprise collectible dolls with stylish hair, fun to dress outfits and many detailed accessory pieces make a perfect toy and playset for kids including 4- to 7-year-olds and up girls and boys for imaginative pretend play! As birthday gifts and gifts for any special occasion, dolls provide hours of social play with siblings and friends! From MGA Entertainment, creators of L.O.L. Surprise fashion and collectible dolls, Rainbow High™ fashion dolls, Na Na Na Surprise dolls, Bratz® fashion dolls, MGA's Dream Ella™, MGA's Glitter Babyz™, Lalaloopsy™, Baby Born® Surprise baby dolls and collectibles, Little Tikes® kids' toys and many other favorite brands.

reviews.reviewText: These dolls are just the cutest! My daughter and I loved mixing and creating the skirt for her doll.Plus glitter just makes it even more fun.What a great activity for kids.Yes, she does have legs and shoes. The rubber skirt mold can be used after.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed !!! I. Need. More !!!
reviews.reviewText: We can all agree that there are so many lol tots out there but these are by far the most fun I’ve had with them as an adult collector ! The whole concept is very smart, adorable, and really brings out your creative side ! (Even my partner was intrigued by these and helped me out with making them) Also, be aware that these have sticky residue so be careful with the surface you’re playing on !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Dont Be Fooled like me
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying LOL Surprise dolls for my daughter and I judge them a couple criteria's. 1) cost, 2) time for play 3) Cleanliness 4) repeatability. 1)COST: the doll was a good price, at 9.99 you would think it would be a slam dunk. 2)TIME FOR PLAY: this is where we hit a snag. before my daughter could play with the doll she had to "create" the cake her doll would sit in. this took about 15 minutes of set up before we could even unmold the dolls "cake" and add in the fact it took 24 hours to stop being sticky before we could even play with the dolls outside of the kitchen. 3)CLEANLINESS: this left the table a mess. Water, The bouncy ball maker material, and the confetti glitter as "sprinkles" let my kitchen table unusable for a solid 20 minutes it took to clean up. this toy is usually given to the child on road trips and on other outings so this toy would also be unusable if away from a water source. 4)REPEATABLITY: this was a once and done doll. I like to have things to repeat with a doll. no water bottles to make cry, spit, or pee (a major selling point.) plus the doll does NOT come with a bottom (just a shirt, shoes and painted on modesty piece). I wouldn't buy this unless your looking for a showpiece that when done goes in a cabinet or on a shelf.

reviews.reviewerName: Horrible. Only the color was the same as pictured.  Measurements were wacky and didn't make sence. Wasn't made right. Sizing was off every way shaped form. Waste of money. I returned it.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 5 and 9 year old were excited to open. Very fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to do! Fun to create!
reviews.reviewText: This is a really neat idea. It provides a creative outlet for kids. We got Neon Q.T. in our surprise ball, but it looks like there is a total of 9 different dolls that you can get. 3 packets of color powder come with each doll. We made the mistake of combining the colors all together, but you are supposed to layer the colors. It's fine, because it still turned out very cute! I think we spent a total of 10 minutes creating the skirt. The instructions were primarily pictures, so I'm going to provide my own instructions in writing below. Also, a QR code is provided on the instructions that show a video on how to do it, but I couldn't get it to work. I'm wondering if MGA will release refill kits so that more skirts can be made. This LOL doll was so much fun to make! My girls loved it!1. After unboxing every item, attach the handle to the side of the mixing bowl2. Leave both skirting molds together, then flip upside down in the mixing bowl.3. Fill the color powder in layers between the skirting molds. Make sure it stays between both skirts. Smooth out powder with spatula.4. Add water in the center hole until the water surrounds the entire skirt around the outside of it. Hold down for two minutes.5. Pull out of the water and peel back the exterior layer of the skirt to reveal the gel like mold. Note: Keep the interior skirt on (this is the part that goes on the doll). Let the mold sit for 5 minutes.6. Add sprinkles to the other bowl. Dunk the completed skirt mold into water, pull out, and then place sprinkles on.7. Place completed skirt onto doll . Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for a 5 year old to keep her busy

We got this for my daughter for her birthday. It was a unique change from the basic LOL dolls. However, it was very messy and the instructions were not the greatest for explaining how to make the skirt. We ended up throwing out the gel skirt that it makes because it was falling apart, and just using the blue mold piece as her clothing. It still looks good though.
